title: 30d08 - IRS tip allocation rules.
text:
Where an employer withholds taxes from a tipped
employee based upon a percentage of sales, rather than on reported tips, a
reduction in an individual employee’s net pay may result, but this is not an
FLSA violation.  (Rev. 563, 12/9/88)
html: Where an employer withholds taxes from a tipped employee based upon a percentage of sales, rather than on reported tips, a reduction in an individual employee’s net pay may result, but this is not an FLSA violation.  (Rev. 563, 12/9/88)
